name: De Charles
slogan: Better products, better brands, better perceptions for Africa
description:
We are a team of entrepreneurs, engineers and storytellers who are eager to bring forward our vision of Africa’s future. We are doing this by building products and narratives with similarly inspired Africa-focused founders, to realise companies capable of changing global perceptions of Africa.

We’re on a mission to build better products, better brands, and better perceptions for Africa. Once this mission and message becomes irrelevant so will we.

jobs.title: Product Partner
jobs.description:
## We’re a firm on a mission to build better products, brands and perceptions for Africa…
Africa is mostly made up of the young, who have grown up in its period of increasing positivity, and so - regardless of their socioeconomic condition - anticipate change and are ambitiously striving to effect it. Therefore, with its large and youthful population, infectious culture and excess of opportunities, within ten years we believe African companies can sit among the largest in the world, with globally recognisable brands.

We are a team of entrepreneurs, engineers, designers, strategists and storytellers, who have chosen to take action to bring Africa’s future forward. By working with similarly inspired Africa-focused founders, we believe we can create companies that can provide African and international audiences with new and more aspiring associations with the region. Therefore, we’re on a mission to build better products, better brands, and better perceptions for Africa, and once this mission and message becomes irrelevant so will we.

### Product Partner at De Charles
As a Product Developer at De Charles, you will play a significant role in helping the company build products and high quality customer experiences for our clients.  As part of a growing and multidisciplinary team you will be expected to function broadly and be a part of furthering clients’ growth in both narratives and product development engagements. 

### The Contribution
In your position as a product partner you will lead the planning, strategy and delivery of products for De Charles’ clients, and have a minor focus (5-10%) on contributing to the company’s growth efforts. As a partner you will play a unique role in helping a new generation of Africa-focused companies grow, by working with them to build and launch better products and narratives.

**Your contribution will include:**
* A platform and language agnostic approach to analysing, developing and delivering products. 
* Working closely with the other partners and prospect teams prior to engagement, to plan and scope possible future projects.
* Performing gap analysis and audits on the client’s current platforms and architecture(s) to identify challenges and opportunities.
* Leading in the management and execution of developing new, or furthering existing, products for clients.
* Working with designers and strategists to understand and translate UI/UX and other customer design elements into development tasks and new architecture possibilities.
* Establishing and building application architecture for new client systems based on the latest developments in the industry, and any limitations faced by their regional customers.
* Lead the effort of writing technical architecture, detailed software design and user documentation for clients systems.
* Developing Intellectual Property for De Charles and our clients
* The ability to support the client organisation pre- and post-launch

### You are...
Someone who has creative ideas and a deep understanding of engineering, who is eager to apply them entrepreneurially at a high level to help clients - and soon De Charles - build and launch ventures of their own. You are excited to contribute broadly to, and take a leading role in, the development of a growing company. You are not afraid of learning on the job, working across several functions and geographies, not keen on constraining yourself to job titles. You are growth and outcome oriented.

**You bring the following competencies to a team:**
* A strong entrepreneurial spirit with a passion for Africa’s growth.
* Resourcefulness and an ability to work in unclear environments that require adaptability.
* A growing awareness of behaviour, technology, and business trends globally and in Africa.
* An appreciation not just for technology, but also design and communication, and the importance of each of their roles and interactions in the making of a company.
* A passion and comfort for on-the-spot brainstorming, to conceive and create new products and customer experiences in diverse markets.
